snippet.title: Ultimate Chicken Horse: Chimply Amazing Update
snippet.description:
The build-as-you-play party platformer Ultimate Chicken Horse is OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch! Read about the update below ↓↓↓

This massive update includes the brand new Monkey character; the new Mainframe, Crumbling Bridge, and Nuclear Plant levels; a player-activated punching block, a crumbling block, and a time-slowing slowatch; as well as customizable game rules and point scoring. Learn more here:
https://www.cleverendeavourgames.com/chimply-amazing-update

Nintendo Americas: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/ultimate-chicken-horse-switch
Nintendo Europe / Oceania: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Ultimate-Chicken-Horse-1442452.html
Nintendo Japan: https://ec.nintendo.com/JP/ja/titles/70010000002403
